title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The first selection of any item in the library outline view should successfully select the item.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Additional Notes: The second time I select the label item, it can be selected.
